description:
We should remove LazySerializationMiddleware. It currently exists for backwards compatibility for the api-paste.ini config file.

I don't think api-paste.ini stands much chance of being backwards compatible however so we should probably just remove this deprecated middleware.
title: remove LazySerializationMiddleware

comments.content:
We should remove LazySerializationMiddleware. It currently exists for backwards compatibility for the api-paste.ini config file.

I don't think api-paste.ini stands much chance of being backwards compatible however so we should probably just remove this deprecated middleware.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince
